patthana16.79:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.79:4.3: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … avigate cha.
patthana16.79:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
